subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jeff Carter and Chris Pronger both scored two goals, to back a strong goaltending performance by Sergei Bobrovsky, and the Philadelphia Flyers beat the Islanders, 6-1.
snippet: Jeff Carter and Chris Pronger both scored two goals, to back a strong goaltending performance by Sergei Bobrovsky, and the Philadelphia Flyers beat the Islanders, 6-1.
